ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains the gain value applied to each component of electric and magnetic fields from the IESP wave experiment on board Interball-Auroral

Parameter.Name: IESP gain value applied to Ex component
Parameter.Description: IESP gain value applied to Ex component for raw to calibrated data conversion

Parameter.Name: IESP gain value applied to Ey component
Parameter.Description: IESP gain value applied to Ey component for raw to calibrated data conversion

Parameter.Name: IESP gain value applied to Ez component
Parameter.Description: IESP gain value applied to Ez component for raw to calibrated data conversion

Parameter.Name: IESP gain value applied to Bx component
Parameter.Description: IESP gain value applied to Bx component for raw to calibrated data conversion

Parameter.Name: IESP gain value applied to By component
Parameter.Description: IESP gain value applied to By component for raw to calibrated data conversion

Parameter.Name: IESP gain value applied to Bz component
Parameter.Description: IESP gain value applied to Bz component for raw to calibrated data conversion
